title: Project STRETCH
text:
Average Lats by Date



CCS vs CCLME extent
Spatial comparison of the California Current System (CCS) as defined by Kahru et al. 2018 vs California Current Large Marine Ecosystem (CCLME) boundary (see ref).
A coarse resolution buffer was applied from the North American Coast to delineate the CCS Transition (300 km) and Offshore (1000 km) boundaries.
 


Turtle-CCS Movements
Maps showing individual movement into the CCS region by group: Historic, Cohort 1, and Cohort 2 
The portion of the track during Sept-Oct is shown in red 

HistoricCohort 1 (2023)Cohort 2 (2024)

title: Project STRETCH
text:
Running Code
When you click the Render button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

1 + 1

[1] 2


You can add options to executable code like this


[1] 4


The echo: false option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
This is a playground for Quarto.

title: Project STRETCH

5. Feb-27-2025:

Added Monthly Mean Turtle Latitude plots
Added Map of CCS vs CCLME spatial boundaries
Added Turtle Movements into CCS plots

Monthly mean SST and turtle latitudes between 142°W to 130°W longitude.
